showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // {Cloud}
“I thought you would never come, and
I was getting a little cold.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Cloud}
“I thought about Sephiroth all the time.
Even in my sleep.
My mom had given up on me.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:0}); // {Tifa}
“Look, the well.”{PAUSE}“Do you remember?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Tifa}
“I had no idea you were planning on that.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Tifa}
“But, what about our promise?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // {Cloud}
“Come this Spring…I'm leaving
town for Midgar.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // {Cloud}
“But I'm different from them.
I'm not just going to find a job.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // {Cloud}
“I want to join SOLDIER.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // {Cloud}
“I'm going to be the best there is,
just like Sephiroth!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Cloud}
“…I probably won't be able to come
back to this town for a while.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // {Tifa}
“You said you wanted to
talk to me about something?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // {Tifa}
“All the boys are leaving town.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Tifa}
“Isn't it hard to join SOLDIER?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // {Tifa}
“If you make it, will you be in the newspapers?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Tifa}
“Hey, let's make a promise.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {Tifa}
“Umm…if you get really famous and
I'm ever in a bind…”{PAUSE}“you'll come save me, all right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Tifa}
“If I'm ever in trouble, my hero will
come and rescue me.”{PAUSE}“I want to experience that at least once.”

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“I thought you would never come, and
I was getting a little cold.”

{Tifa}
“You said you wanted to
talk to me about something?”

{Cloud}
“Come this Spring…I'm leaving
town for Midgar.”

{Cloud}
“But I'm different from them.
I'm not just going to find a job.”

{Cloud}
“I'm going to be the best there is,
just like Sephiroth!”

{Cloud}
“I thought about Sephiroth all the time.
Even in my sleep.
My mom had given up on me.”

{Tifa}
“I had no idea you were planning on that.”

{Cloud}
“…I probably won't be able to come
back to this town for a while.”

{Tifa}
“If you make it, will you be in the newspapers?”

{Tifa}
“Umm…if you get really famous and
I'm ever in a bind…”{PAUSE}“you'll come save me, all right?”

{Tifa}
“If I'm ever in trouble, my hero will
come and rescue me.”{PAUSE}“I want to experience that at least once.”
